original: 袁術得玉璽後，自任受天命依歸，不久後即僭號稱帝。而孫策則召集父親舊部起兵，東渡長江，平定江東，建立根據地。
text: After Yuan Shu got the Yuxi, he was appointed by the destiny, and soon afterwards he was arrogantly named emperor. Sun Ce summoned his father's old ministry to raise troops, cross the Yangtze River east, calm Jiangdong, and establish base areas.
